price: (15) [Allāh] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
